title: Disable chat, or automatic full mute all.
body: Is it possible to completely disable chat and pings, or have full mute all automatically happen at the start of the game?

replies.body: We don't currently have options to auto-disable chat or auto-mute everyone since League is a team game. If you know you're not going to be using the chat function, just use /mute all at the beginning of the match.
you can use **/mute all** at the beginning to get the desired effect, IIRC.

Not that im aware of. I know you can disable /all chat in the settings but I dont believe there is a way to mute your teammates as well unless you mute them individually at the start of the game. You could also just make your chat log really small to read so you dont have to mute four people every game if you just dont want to read/talk.
